formula: a(n) = Product(((bit_n(n, i)*(2^(2^(i+1))))+1), i=0..inf); # A direct algebraic formula!a(n) = sum{k=0..n, (C(2*n, 2*k) mod 2)*4^(n-k)}. - _Paul Barry_, Jan 03 2005a(2*n+1) = 5*a(2n); a(n+1) = a(n) XOR 4*a(n) where XOR is binary exclusive OR operator. - _Philippe Deléham_, Jun 18 2005a(n) = A001317(2n). - _Alex Ratushnyak_, May 04 2012
